metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22930 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: Node.js before 16.6.0, 14.17.4, and 12.22.4 is vulnerable to a use after free attack where an attacker might be able to exploit the memory corruption, to change process behavior.

criterions.comment: nodejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
